Business Owner

A Business Owner is an individual who is on file with the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) and who has authority to provide consent on behalf of the organization for disclosure of their organization information from the CRA to Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC). Consent from a Business Owner is required to complete the registration process. If you are not a Business Owner, please provide the name and email address of an individual who is a Business Owner for your organization.

First Name: Riley
Last Name: Smith
Email: riley.s@hotmail.com

Business Owner's Information

I declare I am a Business Owner on file with the CRA for this organization.

Yes No
